title: Chiropractic and Acupuncture Benefits
description: Don't worry, we've got your back. Your plan includes chiropractic and acupuncture benefits through American Specialty Health Network.
cleaned_text: Chiropractic and Acupuncture Benefits Don't worry, we've got your back. Your plan includes chiropractic and acupuncture benefits through American Specialty Health Network. American Specialty Health (ASH) Kaiser Permanente partners with American Specialty Health so you can get care from their network of acupuncture and chiropractic practitioners at a discounted rate. When you need chiropractic care or acupuncture, you have direct access to more than 3,400 licensed chiropractors and more than 2,000 licensed acupuncturists in California. |No referral required| |$15 per visit | Using Your Chiropractic and Acupuncture Benefits: - Find a practitioner who's part of the ASH Network. Search for a practitioner online at [www.ashlink.com](https://www.ashlink.com/ash/ashco.aspx?hp=KaiserCA); or call ASH Networks Member Services at 1-800-678-9133 (8 a.m. to 5 p.m. PST) to request a list of practitioners near you. - Choose a practitioner, then call the office directly to schedule an appointment. - At your appointment, present your Kaiser Permanente ID Card to verify your eligibility. Pay your designated copay and you're good to go. Ready to Get Started? [Find a practitioner through ASH](https://www.ashlink.com/ash/ashco.aspx?hp=KaiserCA) Questions? Call ASH Networks Member Services at 1-800-678-9133 (8 a.m. to 5 p.m. PST). 1 Up to a combined total of 20 chiropractic and acupuncture visits per calendar year from American Specialty Health (ASH) network
